titles.title: People Of God, It Is Time To Arise

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
People of God, it is time to arise
And proclaim to creation, We're not going to die.
Let it ring from the valleys and the mountains to high,
God's people proclaiming We're not going to die!
All heaven's rejoicing, now hear them all sing,
Grave where's thy victory and death, where's thy sting?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The saints of the centuries have all come to pass
With each one fulfilling their God-given task.
But to the Sons God has spoken, and we witness His cry.
Proclaim to creation you're not going to die.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now the prophets of the Lord had a line that they laid
And though they were steadfast, these all died in faith.
But they spoke of a people who would one day arise
And proclaim to creation, they're not going to die.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Take courage now brethren, close in your ranks.
Stand on the promise, giving God thanks.
For Satan will fight us, or surely will try,
But he can't beat a people who aren't going to die.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We're not going to sin.
We're not going to sin.
People of God it is time to begin,
To proclaim to creation we're not going to sin.
I'm washed in the blood and filled with His Spirit,
I love the Father and I want to show it.
I say No to me, and I'll say Yes to Him.
I'm not going to die, 'cause I'm not going to sin.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Now Herb, Gary, Sam-had a line that they laid,
And just like the Lamb they all died in faith,
But they preached to a people who are entering in,
Who never will die, because they're not going to sin.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Pueblo de Dios pues la hora llegó
Proclamad a la tierra que no morirá.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Que suenen de los valles, las cumbres también
Un pueblo proclama que no morirá
Los cielos se regocijan, oídlos cantar
La muerte y el sepulcro son vencidos ya

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Los profetas antiguos pusieron su renglón
Eran firmes más murieron conforme a la fe
Más hablaron de un pueblo que se iba a levantar
A proclamar a la tierra que no morirá

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Animaos hermanos, las filas juntad
Creed en las promesas, dad gracias a Dios
Satanás luchará sin embargo no podrá
Derrotar a un pueblo que no morirá
